attributes.action: Remove the duplicity existing between Income ESA & Child Benifit Cap
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the duplicity existing between:

Income – ESA

The earnings of your partner ARE treated as your income.

http://www.benefitsnow.co.uk/esa/income.asp

and

Child Benefit Cap

The earnings of your partner are NOT treated as your income.


www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-17459856
